data.title: My Life Without Me - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of My Life Without Me with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
57 Metascore

2003

1 hr 56 mins

Drama

R

Watchlist

Where to Watch

A tour-de-force performance by Sarah Polley distinguishes this bittersweet tearjerker about a young wife and mother who discovers she's dying and decides to pack as much into her final days as possible. Deborah Harry is especially moving as her bitter mother whose husband has spent most of their time together in jail. Written and directed by Isabel Coixet. Scott Speedman, Mark Ruffalo, Amanda Plummer.
